funFacts.label: One-repo MVP
funFacts.detail: All-in on cloudinary: 75 merges focused on one codebase = maximum momentum, minimum context switching.

funFacts.label: Busiest quarter
funFacts.detail: Started the year like a release train—shipping early foundations for permissions, monitors, and migrations.

funFacts.label: Largest PR by lines
funFacts.detail: The 'Visual Search Monitor' mega-change (PR #19516): big surface area, big confidence boost for search monitoring.

funFacts.label: Safety-first refactors
funFacts.detail: You were the quality gate: heavy review support for @cloudinary-jenkins (23) and @adilester (20), plus 20+ more teammates.

funFacts.label: Theme of the year
funFacts.detail: From granular permissions responses to folder CRUD schemas and OpenSearch cleanup—tightening both security and reliability.

bigRocks.title: Visual Search Watchtower
bigRocks.impact: Built and stabilized visual search monitoring so issues get spotted before customers do.

bigRocks.title: 403: The Permission Awakens
bigRocks.impact: Upgraded authorization behavior and defaults, making access rules clearer and safer across flows.

bigRocks.title: Folders API: From Sketch to Ship
bigRocks.impact: Delivered folder schema + CRUD building blocks to power consistent folder operations end-to-end.

bigRocks.title: Single-Folder Rule Enforcer
bigRocks.impact: Implemented enforcement logic that keeps folder behavior predictable and prevents edge-case chaos.

bigRocks.title: Role Cleanup on Folder Deletion
bigRocks.impact: Made folder deletion safer by removing lingering roles and closing permission loopholes.

quarterlyActivity.highlights: Search + OpenSearch foundations: monitors, credentials, shard experiments, and early permission guardrails.
Folder mechanics took over—schemas, list_sub_folders upgrades, and single-folder enforcement momentum.
Navigation and folder workflows got polished—full-tree flow fixes, download flow work, and 'rename' hardening.
Year-end reliability sprint: locks for datasource updates, minimal permission responses, and long-operations improvements.

topRepos.name: cloudinary
topRepos.funFact: The full season was played on one field—and you still racked up 125 reviews while shipping 75 merges.

yearInReview.headline: The Year of Safer Access & Smoother Search
yearInReview.tagline: 75 PRs merged, 8,016 lines added, 2,249 removed, and 125 reviews—locking down permissions, leveling up folders, and keeping OpenSearch honest.
